name: Yeoman
description: A generic scaffolding system allowing the creation of any kind of app

Getting Started.val: Install yo, the command line utility for Yeoman
Install the needed generator(s).  Generators are npm packages named generator-XYZ.  The list of available generators can be found at:  http://yeoman.io/generators/

Basic Scaffolding.val: To scaffold a new project.  In this case, the generator name is the name of the generator package without the 'generator-' prefix.  ('XYZ' instead of 'generator-XYZ')

Troubleshooting.val: The doctor command will diagnose and provide steps to resolve the most common issues
